imos
Interface IActivation

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<IActivation>
All Known Implementing Classes:
Activation
public interface IActivation
extends java.lang.Comparable<IActivation>

An activation consists of the activated act and a weight that determines the strength of the activation. Primitive acts that receive the highest summarized activation weight are selected for enaction.

Author:
ogeorgeon
